verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and drop <S%H5197><s%> thy word toward the sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%>, and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

and say <S%H559><s%> to the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Behold <S%H3318><s%>, I am against thee, and will draw forth my sword <S%H2719><s%> out of its sheath <S%H8593><s%>, and will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from thee the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

Seeing <S%H3282><s%> then that I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from thee the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, therefore shall my sword <S%H2719><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> out of its sheath <S%H8593><s%> against all flesh <S%H1320><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%>:

and all flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have drawn forth <S%H3318><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> out of its sheath <S%H8593><s%>; it shall not return any more <S%H7725><s%>.

Sigh <S%H584><s%> therefore <S%H1121><s%>, thou son of man <S%H120><s%>; with the breaking <S%H7670><s%> of thy loins <S%H4975><s%> and with bitterness <S%H4814><s%> shalt thou sigh <S%H584><s%> before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H559><s%>, when they say unto thee <S%H584><s%>, Wherefore sighest thou <S%H559><s%>? that thou shalt say, Because of the tidings <S%H8052><s%>, for it cometh <S%H935><s%>; and every heart <S%H3820><s%> shall melt <S%H4549><s%>, and all hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be feeble <S%H7503><s%>, and every spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall faint <S%H3543><s%>, and all knees <S%H1290><s%> shall be weak <S%H3212><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>: behold <S%H935><s%>, it cometh, and it shall be done <S%H1961><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Say <S%H559><s%>, A sword <S%H2719><s%>, a sword <S%H2719><s%>, it is sharpened <S%H2300><s%>, and also furbished <S%H4803><s%>;

it is sharpened <S%H2300><s%> that it may make a <S%H2874><s%> slaughter <S%H2873><s%>; it is furbished <S%H4178><s%> that it may be as lightning <S%H1300><s%>: shall <S%H176><s%> we then make mirth <S%H7797><s%>? the rod <S%H7626><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%>, it contemneth <S%H3988><s%> every tree <S%H6086><s%>.

And it is given <S%H5414><s%> to be furbished <S%H4803><s%>, that it may be handled <S%H3709><s%>: the sword <S%H2719><s%>, it is sharpened <S%H2300><s%>, yea <S%H4178><s%>, it is furbished, to give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the slayer <S%H2026><s%>.

Cry <S%H2199><s%> and wail <S%H3213><s%>, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>; for it is upon my people <S%H5971><s%>, it is upon all the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: they are delivered <S%H4048><s%> over to <S%H413><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> with my people <S%H5971><s%>; smite <S%H5606><s%> therefore upon thy thigh <S%H3409><s%>.
For there is a trial <S%H974><s%>; and what if even the rod <S%H7626><s%> that contemneth <S%H3988><s%> shall be no more <S%H5002><s%>? saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

Thou therefore <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and smite <S%H5221><s%> thy hands <S%H3709><s%> together <S%H5221><s%>; and let the sword <S%H2719><s%> be doubled <S%H3717><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> time <S%H2719><s%>, the sword of the deadly wounded <S%H2491><s%>: it is the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> one that is deadly wounded <S%H2491><s%>, which entereth into their chambers <S%H2314><s%>.

I have set <S%H5414><s%> the threatening <S%H19><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> against all their gates <S%H8179><s%>, that their heart <S%H3820><s%> may melt <S%H4127><s%>, and their stumblings <S%H4383><s%> be multiplied <S%H7235><s%>: ah <S%H253><s%>! it is made <S%H6213><s%> as lightning <S%H1300><s%>, it is pointed <S%H4593><s%> for slaughter <S%H2874><s%>.

Gather thee together <S%H258><s%>, go to <S%H7760><s%> the right <S%H3231><s%>, set thyself in array <S%H8041><s%>, go to the left, whithersoever <S%H575><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> is set <S%H3259><s%>.
I will also smite <S%H5221><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> together <S%H3709><s%>, and I will cause my wrath <S%H2534><s%> to rest <S%H5117><s%>: I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me again <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Also <S%H1121><s%>, thou son of man <S%H120><s%>, appoint <S%H7760><s%> thee two <S%H8147><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, that the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> may come <S%H935><s%>; they twain <S%H8147><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of one <S%H259><s%> land <S%H776><s%>: and mark out <S%H1254><s%> a place <S%H3027><s%>, mark it out <S%H1254><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Thou shalt appoint <S%H7760><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> for the sword <S%H2719><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Rabbah <S%H7237><s%> of the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%>, and to Judah <S%H3063><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> the fortified <S%H1219><s%>.

For the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at the parting <S%H517><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%>, at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, to use <S%H7080><s%> divination <S%H7081><s%>: he shook <S%H7043><s%> the arrows <S%H2671><s%> to and fro <S%H7592><s%>, he consulted the teraphim <S%H8655><s%>, he looked <S%H7200><s%> in the liver <S%H3516><s%>.

In his right hand <S%H3225><s%> was the divination <S%H7081><s%> for Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, to set <S%H7760><s%> battering rams <S%H3733><s%>, to open <S%H6605><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the slaughter <S%H7524><s%>, to lift up <S%H7311><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> with shouting <S%H8643><s%>, to set <S%H7760><s%> battering rams <S%H3733><s%> against the gates <S%H8179><s%>, to cast <S%H8210><s%> up mounds <S%H5550><s%>, to build <S%H1129><s%> forts <S%H1785><s%>.

And it shall be unto them as a false <S%H7723><s%> divination <S%H7080><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>, who have sworn <S%H7650><s%> oaths <S%H7621><s%> unto them <S%H5771><s%>; but he bringeth iniquity to remembrance <S%H2142><s%>, that they may be taken <S%H8610><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Because ye have made your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to be remembered <S%H2142><s%>, in that your transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are uncovered <S%H1540><s%>, so that in all your doings <S%H5949><s%> your sins <S%H2403><s%> do appear <S%H7200><s%>; because that ye are come to remembrance <S%H2142><s%>, ye shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> with the hand <S%H3709><s%>.

And thou <S%H2491><s%>, O deadly wounded wicked <S%H7563><s%> one <S%H5387><s%>, the prince of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whose day <S%H3117><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, in the time <S%H3117><s%> of the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%>,

thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Remove <S%H5493><s%> the mitre <S%H4701><s%>, and take off <S%H7311><s%> the crown <S%H5850><s%>; this shall be no more the same <S%H2063><s%>; exalt <S%H1361><s%> that which is low <S%H8217><s%>, and abase <S%H8213><s%> that which is high <S%H1364><s%>.

I will overturn <S%H5754><s%>, overturn <S%H5754><s%>, overturn <S%H5754><s%> it <S%H7760><s%>: this also shall be no more <S%H935><s%>, until he come whose right <S%H4941><s%> it is <S%H5414><s%>; and I will give it him.

And thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> concerning the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%>, and concerning their reproach <S%H2781><s%>; and say <S%H559><s%> thou <S%H2719><s%>, A sword, a sword <S%H2719><s%> is drawn <S%H6605><s%>, for the slaughter <S%H2874><s%> it is furbished <S%H4803><s%>, to cause it to devour <S%H398><s%>, that it may be as lightning <S%H1300><s%>;

while they see <S%H2372><s%> for thee false visions <S%H7080><s%>, while they divine lies <S%H3577><s%> unto thee <S%H6677><s%>, to lay thee upon the necks of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> that are deadly wounded <S%H3117><s%>, whose day is come <S%H935><s%> in the time <S%H3117><s%> of the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%>.

Cause it to return <S%H7725><s%> into its sheath <S%H8593><s%>. In the place <S%H4725><s%> where thou wast created <S%H1254><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of thy birth <S%H4351><s%>, will I judge thee <S%H8199><s%>.

And I will pour out <S%H8210><s%> mine indignation <S%H2195><s%> upon thee <S%H6315><s%>; I will blow upon thee with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%>; and I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of brutish <S%H1197><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, skilful <S%H2796><s%> to destroy <S%H4889><s%>.

Thou shalt be for fuel <S%H402><s%> to the fire <S%H784><s%>; thy blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; thou shalt be no more remembered <S%H2142><s%>: for I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.
